definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">"The liquid burns in my mouth and throat."</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1000</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_deal_custom_damage"><value name="damage_number"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">50</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="localization_text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">bleach</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
